text.section: The duties of the commissioners in regard to the construction, reconstruction and designation of roads to be built with the proceeds of the bond issue, shall be the same as those now exercised by the fiscal court.
If the county receives financial aid from the state, the commissioners shall act under the supervision of the Department of Highways.

law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4307a-2, 4307a-4.
